id: Midnight Library Book Tracker & Quote Overview Notion
name: Midnight Library Book Tracker & Quote Overview Notion
description: Get an overview of your readings, organize your favourite quotes and books so that you have a list ready when someone asks for your recommendations, track how close you are to your annual goal of reading 10 books per year. A template inspired by Matt Haig's bestseller novel: "Midnight Library". What's inside?:✔️ Unique related Database✔️ Bookshelf with multiple filtered view✔️ Book Summary& Quotes section✔️ Collection by Genre✔️ Pre-made templates
